config.name: diskOffering.setNullWhenDeleting
config.description: whether update disk offering column of volume inventory to NULL when the disk offering is deleted

config.name: deletionPolicy
config.description: the behavior of deleting a data volume, options are [Direct, Delay, Never]. Direct: delete the volume from database and primary storage; Delay: change the volume's state to Deleted in database; after the period controlled by 'expungePeriod' passes, delete the volume from database and primary storage; Never: delete the volume from database but from the primary storage

config.name: expungePeriod
config.description: the period before a deleted data volume being deleted from database and primary storage, in seconds

config.name: expungeInterval
config.description: the interval the expunging data volume task runs, in seconds

config.name: refreshVolumeSizeInterval
config.description: the interval the task to scan the volumes which need refresh size periodical, in seconds
